GV04sankharu:6: tasmād enat parasmai na śaṃsen net sarveṣāṃ chandasām ātmanaṃ parasmin dadhānīti ||
GV04sankharu:8: pitre vācāryāya vātmane haivāsya tacchandastaṃ bhavati |
GV04sankharu:14: atho caturviṃśo vai purastāt kṛto bhavati tasyaiṣa gatir yat pañcaviṃśaḥ |
GV04sankharu:19: atho etad eva paśuṣvaindraṃ rūpaṃ yad ṛṣabhaḥ ||
GV04sankharu:20: tasya viśoviśo vo atithim iti dvādaśarcam ājyam |
GV04sankharu:22: tasmin vai dve chandasī bhavato gāyatryaścānuṣṭubhaśca |
GV04sankharu:23: agniṃ naro dīdhitibhiraraṇyor ityetat pañcaviṃśatyṛcam upasaṃśaṃsati |
GV04sankharu:25: tad vai śastraṃ samṛddhaṃ yat stomena saṃpadyate |
GV04sankharu:26: tasmin vai dve chandasī bhavato virājaśca triṣṭubhaśca |
GV04sankharu:28: catuṣṭayaṃ vā idaṃ sarvam asyaiva sarvasyāptyai |
GV04sankharu:32: kuvid aṅga namasā ye vṛdhāsa ity vāyavyaṃ mahadvad vṛdhavat |
GV04sankharu:34: | ata evottaraṃ tṛcam aindravāyavaṃ yāvattarastanvo yāvadoja iti yāvannaraścakṣasā dīdhyānā ityetena rūpeṇa |
GV04sankharu:35: ud vāṃ cakṣurvaruṇa supratīkam iti maitrāvaruṇaṃ devayoreti sūryastatanvān ityetena rūpeṇa
GV04sankharu:36: ka u śravat katamo yajñiyānām ityāśvinaṃ yaṃ Suryasya duhitāvṛṇītetyetena rūpeṇa |
GV04sankharu:37: kathā mahām avṛdhat kasya hotur ityaindraṃ mahadvad vṛdhavat |
GV04sankharu:39: ko vastrāta vasavaḥ kau varūteti vaiśvadevaṃ sahīyaso varuṇa mitra martād ityetena rūpeṇa
GV04sankharu:40: uta syā naḥ sarasvatī juṣāṇeti sarasvataṃ dvārāvṛtasya subhago vyāvar ityetena rūpeṇa |
GV04sankharu:41: eṣa vā u kadvāṃstraiṣṭubhas tṛcakl̥pto vāmadevyaḥ praügaḥ |
GV04sankharu:42: prajāpatir vai vāmadevaḥ prajāpatāveva tat sarvān kāman ṛdhnuvanti |
GV04sankharu:43: tad āhur na traiṣṭubhaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ syāt |
GV04sankharu:49: ā tvā rathaṃ yathotaya iti marutvatīyasya pratipat |

GV04sankharu:56: atha yad mahāṁ indro nṛvad ā carṣaṇiprā iti mahadvat |

GV04sankharu:80: yadi caivaṃ stuvīran yadi ca stuvīran anveva japet ||
GV04sankharu:81: tāni vā etani sapta devacchandāṃsi bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:86: athātraiva tiṣṭhann agniṃ yathāṅgam upatiṣṭhate namo nama iti |
GV04sankharu:90: ākāśaṃ śālāyai kuryur iti haika āhuḥ |
GV04sankharu:91: deśena tvevopatiṣṭheta tirohito ha vā eṣa etasmin parama ukthe parama āśiṣo vadati - saṃ mahān mahatyādadhād iti |
GV04sankharu:92: agnir vai mahan iyaṃ pṛthivī mahatī |
GV04sankharu:102: viśvāmitro ha vā indrasya priyaṃ dhāmopajagāma śastreṇa ca vratacaryayā |
GV04sankharu:103: taṃ hendra uvāca viśvāmitra varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti |
GV04sankharu:104: sa hovāca viśvāmitras tvām eva vijānīyām iti |
GV04sankharu:109: taṃ hendra uvāca mahāṃśca mahatī cāsmi |
GV04sankharu:112: tata u ha viśvāmitro vijijñāsām eva cakre |
GV04sankharu:113: taṃ hendra uvācaitad vā aham asmi yad etad avocaṃ yad vā ṛṣe 'to bhūyo 'tapās tadeva tat syād yad aham iti |
GV04sankharu:114: tad vā indro vyāhṛtīr ūce tā upāptā āsann iti |
GV04sankharu:115: athopanidhāya preṅkhaphalakaṃ trir abhyanya trir abhyavān iti ||
GV04sankharu:118: athainad urasā saṃspṛśya dakṣiṇaṃ bhāgam ātmano
GV04sankharu:119: 'tiharañ japati - arko 'si vasavastvā gāyatreṇa cchandasārohantu te ta āroḷhāra ityeva tad āha |
GV04sankharu:121: rājyaṃ ha vā idam u haiva cakṣate |
GV04sankharu:123: rudrāstvā traiṣṭubhena chandasārohantu te ta āroḷhāra ityeva tad āha |
GV04sankharu:125: svārājyaṃ ha vai rājyād adhitarām iva |
GV04sankharu:126: atha dakṣiṇaṃ bhāgam ātmano 'tiharañ japati - ādityāstvā jagatena cchandasārohantu te ta āroḷhāra ityeva tad āha |
GV04sankharu:128: sāmrājyaṃ ha vai svārājyād adhitarām iva |
GV04sankharu:129: athottaraṃ bhāgam ātmano 'tiharañ japati - viśve tvā devā ānuṣṭubhena chandasārohantu te ta āroḷhāra ityeva tad āha |
GV04sankharu:132: atha samadhisṛpya prāñcau pādā upāvahṛtya bhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayati |
GV04sankharu:133: udyatataro ha vā eṣo 'smāl lokād bhavati |
GV04sankharu:135: tad asmiṁl loke pratitiṣṭhati pratiṣṭhāyām apracyutyām |
GV04sankharu:136: atha trit abhanya trir abhyavān iti |
GV04sankharu:137: athopari preṅkhaphalake dakṣiṇottariṇam upasthaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇena prādeśena paścāt prāṅ preṅkhaphalakam upaspṛśati |
GV04sankharu:138: prajāpatiṣ ṭvā rohatu vāyuḥ preṅkhayatv iti |
GV04sankharu:139: prajāpatir vā etad ārohati vāyuḥ preṅkhayati yaj jīvam |
GV04sankharu:140: atha trir abhanya trir abhavān iti |
GV04sankharu:142: saṃ vāk prāṇena, sam ahaṃ prāṇena, saṃ cakṣur manasā sam ahaṃ manasā, saṃ prajāpatiḥ paśubhiḥ sam ahaṃ paśubhir ityāśiṣam eva tad vadate |
GV04sankharu:146: premāṃ vācaṃ vadiṣyāmīti pravadiṣyan hyeṣa etāṃ vācaṃ vadati bahu kariṣyantīṃ bahu kariṣyann iti |
GV04sankharu:149: bahor bhūyaḥ kariṣyantīṃ bahor bhūyaḥ kariṣyann iti bahor bhūyo hyeṣā vāk kariṣyantī bhavati bahor bhūyo 'yaṃ ya etasyāhnaḥ śastraṃ
GV04sankharu:151: svar gamiṣyantīṃ svar gamiṣyann iti svar hyeṣā vāg gamiṣyantī bhavati svar ayaṃ ya etasyāhnaḥ śastraṃ prāpnoti |
GV04sankharu:152: svar imān yajamānān vakṣyan ity eva brūyāt |
GV04sankharu:153: yaṃ dviṣyāt taṃ brūyān nā nāmuṃ nāmum iti |
GV04sankharu:154: sa yāvato ha vā eṣa etasmād devasthāt pratisaṃkhyāya nirdhūnute niṣ ṭad dhūnute |
GV04sankharu:158: vāyur vā eṣa prāṇo bhūtvaitad ukthaṃ śaṃsati |
GV04sankharu:161: gurau vā eṣa yukto bhavati ya etasyāhnaḥ śatraṃ prāpnoti, tasya gurau yuktasyeśvaraḥ prāṇo yadi nāpaparājetoḥ |
GV04sankharu:164: na ha vā etasyai devatāyai digdhena nāsinā na paraśunā na kenacanāvatardo 'sti |
GV04sankharu:165: tad ya evaṃ vidvāṃsam apavadati sa eva pāpīyān bhavati |
GV04sankharu:170: prāṇo vai hiṃkāraḥ prāṇenaivaitad ukthaṃ pratipadyate |
GV04sankharu:171: atho ūrg vai raso hiṃkāra ūrjam eva tad rasam etasmin ukthe dadhāti /
GV04sankharu:172: atho amṛtatvaṃ vai hiṃkāro 'mṛtatvam eva tad ātman
GV04sankharu:175: etad vai pratyakṣaṃ sāma yad rājanam |
GV04sankharu:184: vāg vā etad ahar manas tūṣṇīṃśaṃsaḥ |
GV04sankharu:186: tad id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭham iti stotriyastṛcaḥ |
GV04sankharu:187: vāvṛdhānaḥ śavasā bhūryojā iti vṛdhavan mahadvat |
GV04sankharu:191: ātmā vai pañcaviṃśaḥ prajā paśava upasargaḥ |
GV04sankharu:192: prajayaiva tat paśubhiḥ preṣyair annādyenetyātmānam upasṛjate |
GV04sankharu:193: nadaṃ va odatīnām iti traiṣṭubhāni pūrvāṇi padāni karoti nadasyottarāṇi |
GV04sankharu:194: prathamena traiṣṭubhena padena prathamaṃ nadasya padam uṣasamādhāyāvasyati |
GV04sankharu:198: evaṃ vihṛtāṃ prathamāṃ triḥ śaṃsati, parācīr uttarā evaṃ vihṛtā eva |
GV04sankharu:199: yā tṛtīyā sūktasya tasyā uttaram ardharcam utsṛjati nadasya cottaram |
GV04sankharu:201: mukhasya vivaras tena vācaṃ vadati mukhena vai vācaṃ vadati |
GV04sankharu:202: tau purastād dvipadānāṃ śaṃsati tathā hāsya stotriyānantarhitā bhavatyātmānaṃ śastvā |
GV04sankharu:204: atho āpo vai sūdadohā adbhir vā imāni parvāṇi saṃhitāni bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:205: atho amṛtatvaṃ vai sūdadohā amṛtatvaṃ eva tad ātman dhatte |
GV04sankharu:207: tad yathā ha vai dāruṇaḥ śleṣma saṃśleṣaṇaṃ syāt paricarmaṇyaṃ vaivam tṛcāśītir evasūdadohāḥ sarveṣāṃ vedānāṃ śaṃśleṣiṇī ||
GV04sankharu:210: trīṇi vā asya śīrṣṇaḥ kapālāni bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:212: tāni trīṇi punarevaikaṃ tredhā tredhā tā nava ṛco bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:218: trīṇi vā āsāṃ grīvāṇāṃ parvāṇi bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:226: | ṛṣvā ta indra sthavirasya bāhū iti bāhvor abhirūpā |
GV04sankharu:236: sa eka id dhavyaś carṣaṇīnām iti sūktaṃ tat pacchaḥ |
GV04sankharu:237: tasya dvitīyām uddhṛtya viśvo hyanyo arirājagāmeti |
GV04sankharu:238: yaitasya dvitīyā tām iha dvitīyāṃ karoti |
GV04sankharu:242: trīṇi vā asya pāṇeḥ parvāṇi bhavanti |

GV04sankharu:249: tau vā etau pakṣau bārhatarāthantarau caturviṃśau |
GV04sankharu:256: sapta vai chandāṃsi sarveṣām eva chandasām āptyai |
GV04sankharu:260: stotriyān evaitābhir anuśaṃsati gāyatryā gāyatram auṣṇihyā ca bārhatyā ca bṛhadrathantare
GV04sankharu:261: iyam eva dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ gāyatrī savyam auṣṇihī madhyaṃ bārhatī |
GV04sankharu:270: mahāṁ indro ya ojasetyetayā gāyatrīm aśītiṃ pratipadyate stomair vatsasya vāvṛdha iti mahadvatyā vṛdhavatyā |
GV04sankharu:274: yā indra bhuja ābhara ityetayā bārhatīm aśītiṃ pratipadyate stotāram in maghavann asya vardhayeti mahadvatyā vṛdhavatyā |
GV04sankharu:277: ayaṃ te astu haryata ā mandrair indra haribhiḥ sūkte |
GV04sankharu:278: tad yad ete antataḥ śaṃsati saṃsiddhābhir bṛhatībhir auṣṇihīm aśītiṃ samārohāṇīti ||
GV04sankharu:279: indraḥ suteṣu someṣv ityetayauṣṇihīm aśītiṃ pratipadyate vide vṛdhasya dakṣaso mahān hi ṣa iti vṛdhavatyā mahadvatyā |
GV04sankharu:282: tā vā etā aśītayaḥ saṃśastāḥ saptaviṃśatiśatānyṛcāṃ saṃpadyante |
GV04sankharu:283: sapta vai viṃśati śatāni saṃvatsarasyāhorātrāṇāṃ tad aśītibhiḥ saṃvatsarasyāhorātrāṇyāpnoti
GV04sankharu:286: bārhatyā aśītyā aśītiṃ caturakṣarāṇyuddharati kākubhebhyaḥ pragāthebhyaś caturviṃśatiṃ caturakṣarāṇi tāni catuḥśataṃ caturakṣarāṇi catuḥśate gāyatrīṣūpadadhāti |
GV04sankharu:291: tad yad etad antataḥ śaṃsati saṃsiddhābhir uṣṇigbhir vaśaṃ samārohāṇīti ||
GV04sankharu:295: yad ataḥ kiṃca bahirdhā tata eva tac chrapayati yad antar udare |
GV04sankharu:296: tasmād bahvyo devatā bahūni cchandāṃsi vaśe śasyante |
GV04sankharu:297: tasmād idaṃ bahu viśvarūpam udare 'nnam avadhīyate |
GV04sankharu:303: pratiṣṭhānīyaṃ vai chando dvipadāḥ pratiṣṭhityā eva ||
GV04sankharu:310: vāg vā etad ahar vāg anuṣṭub vācyeva tad vācaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati |
GV04sankharu:312: sa pratnathā kavivṛdha iti tṛcam arkavat tena samṛddham |
GV04sankharu:317: +indrasyaivaitac chando yat triṣṭup tad enaṃ svena chandasā samardhayati |
GV04sankharu:318: hairaṇyastūpīyaṃ ca yātaūtīyaṃ ca bārhatarāthantare bṛhadrathantare hi purastāt kṛte bhavataḥ
GV04sankharu:319: sajanīyaṃ cādhvaryavo bharatendrāya somam iti ca tāḥ saptaviṃśatir ṛco bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:328: tad yathā vraje paśūn avasṛjyārgaleṣīke parivyayet |
GV04sankharu:329: evam evaitaiḥ padānuṣaṅgaiḥ sarvān kāmān ubhayataḥ parigṛhyātman dhatte |
GV04sankharu:339: tad etat sakṛcchastāyāṃ sūdadohasi, yāvacchastraṃ upasarjanyāṃ saṃkhyāyamānāyām ṛte tūṣṇīṃśaṃsaṃ bṛhatīsahasraṃ saṃpadyate |
GV04sankharu:340: tasya vā etasya bṛhatīsahasrasya ṣaṭtriṃśad akṣarāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:350: bārhato vā eṣa ya eṣa tapati |
GV04sankharu:355: ekāhikī yājyā pratiṣṭhā vā ekāhaḥ pratiṣṭhityā eva |
GV04sankharu:357: sagraham evāyaṃ taṃ prāṅ upāvarohati pratyaṅ preṅkhaphalakam apohati |
GV04sankharu:359: yam imaṃ prajayaṃ prājaiṣaṃ tam anvasānīti ned asmāt prajayād ātmānam apādadhānīti |
GV04sankharu:362: prajāpatir viśvakarmā tad enaṃ svena rūpeṇa samardhayati |
GV04sankharu:363: tad dhaitad ahar indro 'girase provācāṅgirā dīrghatamase |
GV04sankharu:364: tata u ha dīrghatamā daśa puruṣāyuṣāṇi jijīva |
GV04sankharu:365: tad apyetad ṛṣir āha dīrghatamā māmateyo jujurvān daśame yuga iti |
GV04sankharu:366: tad etay āyuṣkāmasya śastram iti ha smāha kauṣītakiḥ |
GV04sankharu:367: tad ya evaṃ vidvān etad ahaḥ śaṃsati sarvam āyur asmiṃl loka eti |
GV04sankharu:375: tad devasya savitur vāryaṃ mahad iti sāvitraṃ mahadvat| mahadvad dhyetad ahaḥ |
GV04sankharu:376: te hi dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaśaṃbhuva iti dyāvāpṛthivīyam uruvyacaso mahinī asaścateti mahadvat
GV04sankharu:378: kim u śreṣṭhaḥ kiṃ yaviṣṭho na ājagann ityārbhavam |
GV04sankharu:379: na nindima camasaṃ yo mahākula iti mahadvat |
GV04sankharu:381: asya vāmasya palitasya hotur iti salilaṃ vaiśvadevam |
GV04sankharu:388: bṛhan mahānta urviyā vi rājatheti bṛhadvat |
GV04sankharu:390: baḷa ityā tad vapeṣu dhāyi darśitam iti jātavedasīyaṃ tasya astāvyagniḥ śimīvadbhir arkair ity arkavatyuttamā |
GV04sankharu:397: te 'mṛtatvam āpnuvanti ya etad ahar upayanti ya etad ahar upayanti ||
GV04sankharu:399: citro ha vai gāṅgyāyanir yakṣyamāṇa āruṇiṃ vavre |
GV04sankharu:400: sa ha putraṃ śvetaketuṃ prajighāya yājayeti |
GV04sankharu:401: taṃ hābhyāgataṃ papraccha - gotamasya putra, asti saṃvṛtaṃ loke yasmin mā dhāsyasi, anyatamo vādhvā, tasya mā loke
GV04sankharu:403: sa hovāca - nāham etad veda hantācāryaṃ pṛcchānīti |
GV04sankharu:404: sa ha pitaram āsādya papraccha - itīti māprākṣīt kathaṃ pratibravāṇīti |
GV04sankharu:405: sa hovāca - aham apyetan na veda |
GV04sankharu:406: sadasyeva vayaṃ svādhyāyam adhītya harāmahe yan naḥ pare dadati |
GV04sankharu:408: sa hi samitpāṇiś citraṃ gāṅgyāyaniṃ praticakrama upāyānīti |
GV04sankharu:412: sa hovāca ye vai ke cāsmāl lokāt prayanti candramasam eva te sarvaṃ gacchanti |
GV04sankharu:415: etad vai svargasya lokasya dvāraṃ yac candramāḥ |
GV04sankharu:417: atha yo na pratyāha tam iha vṛṣṭir bhūtvā varṣati
GV04sankharu:418: | sa iha kīṭo vā pataṅgo vā matsyo vā śakunir vā siṃho vā varāho vā paraśvā vā śārdūlo vā puruṣo vānyo vā teṣu teṣu sthaneṣu pratyājāyate yathākarma yathāvidyam |
GV04sankharu:421: vicakṣaṇād ṛtavo reta ābhṛtaṃ pañcadaśāt prasūtāt pitryāvataḥ |
GV04sankharu:422: tan mā puṃsi kartaryerayadhvaṃ puṃsā kartrā mātari māsiṣiñca || sa jāyamāna upajāyamāno dvādaśotrayodaśopamāsaḥ |
GV04sankharu:423: dvādaśatrayodaśena pitrā saṃ tad vide 'haṃ prati tad vide 'haṃ tan ma ṛtavo 'mṛtyava ārambhadhvam || tena satyena tena tapasā ṛtur asmi ārtavo 'smi |
GV04sankharu:426: sa etaṃ devayānaṃ panthānam āpadyāgnilokam āgacchati |
GV04sankharu:432: tasya vā etasya brahmalokasyārohadaḥ, muhūrtā yaṣṭihāḥ, vijarā nadī, ilyo
GV04sankharu:433: vṛkṣaḥ, sālajyaṃ saṃsthanam, aparājitam āyatanam, indraprajāpatī
GV04sankharu:434: dvāragopau, vibhu pramitam, vicakṣaṇāsandī, amitaujāḥ paryaṅkaḥ, priyā ca mānasī, pratirūpā ca cākṣuṣī, puṣpāṇyādāyāvayato vai ca jagāni, ambāś cāmbāyavīś cāpsarasaḥ, ambayā nadyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:436: taṃ brahmāha - abhidhāva ta mama yaśasā |
GV04sankharu:439: taṃ pañca śatānyapsarasāṃ pratiyanti - śataṃ phalahastāḥ, śatam
GV04sankharu:440: āñjanahastāḥ, śataṃ mālyahastāḥ, śataṃ vāsohastāḥ, śataṃ cūṛnahastāḥ |
GV04sankharu:452: tasya priyā jñātayaḥ sukṛtam upayanti, apriyā duṣkṛtam |
GV04sankharu:453: tad yathā rathena dhāvayan rathacakre paryavekṣeta |
GV04sankharu:456: sa eṣa visukṛto duṣkṛto brahma vidvān brahmaivābhipraiti ||
GV04sankharu:475: tasya bhūtaṃ ca bhaviṣyac ca pūrvau pādau |
GV04sankharu:498: yad anyad devebhyaśca prāṇebhyaś ca tat sat |
GV04sankharu:499: atha yad devāś ca prāṇāś ca tat satyam |
GV04sankharu:505: sa brahmeti vijñeya ṛṣir brahmamayo mahān || iti |
GV04sankharu:506: tad āha - kena me pauṃsnāni nāmānyāpnoṣīti |
GV04sankharu:530: tam āha - āpo vai khalu me loko 'yaṃ te 'sāv iti |
GV04sankharu:531: sā yā brahmaṇo jitir yā vyaṣṭiḥ, tāṃ jitiṃ jayati,
GV04sankharu:532: tāṃ vyaṣṭiṃ vyaśnute ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda ||
GV04sankharu:535: tasya vā etasya prāṇasya brahmaṇo mano dūtam, cakṣur goptṛ, śrotraṃ śrāvayitṛ, vāk pariveṣṭrī
GV04sankharu:536: sa yo ha vā etasya prāṇasya brahmaṇo mano dūtaṃ veda dūtavān bhavati |
GV04sankharu:540: tasmai vā etasmai brahmaṇa etā devatā ayācamānāya baliṃ haranti |

GV04sankharu:548: tasya vā etasya prāṇasya brahmaṇo vāk parastāc cakṣur ārundhate |
GV04sankharu:552: tasmai vā etasmai prāṇāya brahmaṇa etā devatā ayācamānāya baliṃ haranti |
GV04sankharu:553: evaṃ haivāsmai sarvāṇi bhūtānyayācamānāyaiva baliṃ haranti |
GV04sankharu:554: ya evaṃ veda tasyopaniṣan na yāced iti |

GV04sankharu:560: ya ekadhanam abhidhyāyāt paurṇamāsyāṃ vāmāvāsyāyāṃ vā śuddhapakṣe vā puṇye nakṣatra eteṣām ekasmin parvaṇyagnim upasamādhāya parisamuhya paristīrya paryukṣya dakṣiṇaṃ ānvācya sruveṇāyahutīr juhoti |
GV04sankharu:561: vāṅ nāma devatāvarodhinī sā me 'muṣmād idam avarundhyāt tasyai svāhā |
GV04sankharu:562: prāṇo nāma devatāvarodhinī sā me 'muṣmād idam avarundhyāt tasyai svāhā |
GV04sankharu:563: śrotraṃ nāma devatāvarodhinī sā me 'muṣmād idam avarundhyāt tasyai svāhā |
GV04sankharu:564: mano nāma devatāvarodhinī sā me 'muṣmād idam avarundhyāt tasyai svāhā |
GV04sankharu:565: prajñā nāma devatāvarodhinī sā me 'muṣmād idam avarundhyāt tasyai svāhā |
GV04sankharu:570: yasya priyo bubhūṣed yasyai yeṣāṃ vā yāsāṃ vaiteṣām evaikasmin parvaṇyetayaivāvṛtaitā ājyāhutīr juhoti |
GV04sankharu:577: atha dhūmagandhaṃ prajighrāyājyalepanenāṅgānyanuvimṛjya vācaṃyamo 'bhipravrajy saṃsparśaṃ jigamiṣet |
GV04sankharu:583: yāvad vai puruṣo bhāṣate na tāvat prāṇituṃ śaknoti |
GV04sankharu:585: yāvad vai puruṣaḥ prāṇiti na tāvad bhāṣituṃ śaknoti |
GV04sankharu:587: ete anante amṛte āhutī jāgracca svapaṃśca saṃtataṃ juhoti |
GV04sankharu:588: atha yā anyā āhutayo 'ntavatyas tāḥ karmamayyo hi bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:589: tad dha smaitat pūrve vidvāṃso 'gnihotraṃ na juhavāñcakruḥ ||
GV04sankharu:600: tad yathaitac chrīmattamaṃ yaśasvitamaṃ tejasvitamam iti śastreṣu bhavati |
GV04sankharu:601: evaṃ haiva sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu śrīmattamo yaśasvitamas tejasitamo bhavati ya evaṃ veda |
GV04sankharu:602: tad etad aiṣṭikaṃ karma yam ātmānam adhvaryuḥ saṃskaroti |
GV04sankharu:607: eṣa u evaitad indrasyātmā bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
GV04sankharu:609: sarvajid dha sma kauṣītakir udyantam ādityam upatiṣṭhate yajñopavītaṃ kṛtvodakam ānīya triḥ prasicyodakapātram |
GV04sankharu:615: tad yad ahorātrābhyāṃ pāpaṃ karoti saṃ tad vṛṅkte |
GV04sankharu:617: yad ahorātrābhyāṃ pāpaṃ karoti saṃ tad vṛṅkte ||
GV04sankharu:618: atha māsimāsyāvāsyāyāṃ vṛttāyāṃ paścāc candramasaṃ dṛśyamānam upatiṣṭhetaitayaivāvṛtā |
GV04sankharu:619: haritatṛṇe vā pratyasya - yan me susīmaṃ hṛdayaṃ divi candramasi śritam |
GV04sankharu:620: manye 'haṃ māṃ tad vidvāṃsaṃ māhaṃ putryam aghaṃ
GV04sankharu:622: na hyasmāt pūrvā prajā praitīti nu jātaputrasya |
GV04sankharu:623: athājātaputrasya - āpyāyasva sametu +te, saṃ te payāṃsi sam u yantu vājāḥ,
GV04sankharu:624: yam ādityā aṃśum āpyāyayantītyetās tisra ṛco japitvā - māsmākaṃ prāṇena prajayā paśubhir āpyāyayiṣṭhāḥ |
GV04sankharu:625: yo' smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmas
GV04sankharu:626: tasya prāṇena prajayā paśubhir āpyāyayasvetyaindrīm āvṛtam āvarta ādityasyāvṛtam anvāvarta iti dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum anvāvartate ||
GV04sankharu:627: atha paurṇamāsyāṃ purastāc candramasaṃ dṛśyamānam upatiṣṭhaitayaivāvṛtā |
GV04sankharu:629: brāhmaṇas ta ekaṃ mukhaṃ tena mukhena rājño 'tsi |
GV04sankharu:631: rājā ta ekaṃ mukhaṃ tena mukhena viśo 'tsi |
GV04sankharu:633: śyenas ta ekaṃ mukhaṃ tena mukhena pakṣiṇo 'tsi |
GV04sankharu:635: agniṣ ṭa ekaṃ mukhaṃ tena mukhenemaṃ lokam atsi |
GV04sankharu:638: yo' smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmas tasya prāṇena prajayā paśubhir apakṣīyasveti daivīm āvṛtam āvarta ādityasyāvṛtam anvāvarta iti dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum anvāvartate ||
GV04sankharu:639: atha saṃvekṣyan jāyāyai hṛdayam abhi mṛśet - yat te susīme hṛdayaṃ śritam antaḥ prajāpatau
GV04sankharu:640: tenāmṛtatvasyeśāne mā tvaṃ putryam aghaṃ ni gā iti ||
GV04sankharu:642: atha proṣyāyan putrasya mūrdhanam abhijighret - aṅgād aṅgāt saṃbhavasi
GV04sankharu:644: ātmā vai putranāmāsi sa jīva śaradaḥ śatam iti nāmāsya dadhāti |
GV04sankharu:645: aśmā bhava paraśur bhava, hiraṇyam astṛtaṃ bhava |
GV04sankharu:646: tejo vai putrānāmāsi sa jīva śaradaḥ śatam iti nāmāsya gṛhṇāti |
GV04sankharu:648: yena prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ paryagṛhṇāt tad ariṣṭyaitena tvā
GV04sankharu:650: athāsya dakṣiṇe karṇe japati - asme prayandhi maghavann ṛjīṣin iti |
GV04sankharu:652: mā bhetthā mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ śataṃ śarada āyuṣaḥ |
GV04sankharu:653: jīvasva putra te nāmnā mūrdhānam abhijighrāmīti trir asya mūrdānam abhijighret |
GV04sankharu:654: gavāṃ tvāṃ hiṃkāreṇābhihiṃkaromīti trir asya mūrdhānam abhihiṃkaroti ||
GV04sankharu:656: etad vai brahma dīpyate yad agnir jvalati |
GV04sankharu:658: tasyādityam eva tejo gacchati vāyuṃ prāṇaḥ |
GV04sankharu:659: etad vai brahma dīpyate yad ādityo dṛśyate |
GV04sankharu:661: tasya candramasam eva tejo gacchati vāyuṃ prāṇaḥ |
GV04sankharu:662: etad vai brahma dīpyate yac candramā dṛśyate |
GV04sankharu:664: tasya vidyutam eva tejo gacchati vāyuṃ prāṇaḥ |
GV04sankharu:665: etad vai brahma dīpyate yad vidyud vidyotate |
GV04sankharu:667: tasyādiśa eva tejo gacchati vāyuṃ prāṇaḥ |
GV04sankharu:668: tā vā etā sarvā devatā vāyum eva praviśya vāyau mṛtvā na mṛcchante |
GV04sankharu:672: etad vai brahma dīpyate yad vācā vadati |
GV04sankharu:676: etad vai brahma dīpyate yac cakṣuṣā paśyati |
GV04sankharu:680: etad vai brahma dīpyate yac chrotreṇa śṛṇoti |
GV04sankharu:684: etad vai brahma dīpyate yan manasā dhyāyati |
GV04sankharu:688: tā vā etā sarvā devatā prāṇam eva praviśya prāṇe mṛtvā na mṛcchante |
GV04sankharu:690: tad yad iha vā evaṃ vidvāṃsam ubhau parvatāv abhipravarteyātāṃ dakṣiṇaścottaraś ca tustūrṣamāṇau na hainaṃ stṛṇvīyātām
GV04sankharu:691: | atha ya enaṃ dviṣanti yāṃś ca svayaṃ dveṣṭi ta evainaṃ parimriyante ||
GV04sankharu:693: etā ha vai devatā ahaṃśreyase vividamānā asmāc charīrād uccakramuḥ |
GV04sankharu:694: tad dha papāta, śuṣkaṃ dārubhūtaṃ śiśye |
GV04sankharu:698: tad vācā vadac cakṣuṣā paśyac chiśya eva |
GV04sankharu:700: tad vācā vadac cakṣuṣā paśyac chrotreṇa śṛṇvac chiśya eva |
GV04sankharu:702: tad vācā vadac cakṣuṣā paśyac chrotreṇa śṛṇvan manasā dhyāyac chiśya eva |
GV04sankharu:705: tā vā etā sarvā devatā prāṇe niḥśreyasaṃ viditvā prāṇam eva prajñātmānam abhisaṃbhūya +sahaivaitaiḥ sarvair asmāc charīrād uccakramuḥ |
GV04sankharu:707: tatho evaivaṃ vidvān prāṇe niḥśreyasaṃ viditvā prāṇam eva prajñātmānam abhisaṃbhūya +sahaivaitaiḥ
GV04sankharu:712: tad amṛto bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
GV04sankharu:715: navais tṛṇair agāraṃ saṃstīryāgnim upasamādhāyodakumbhaṃ sapātram upanidhāyāhatena vāsasā saṃpracchannaḥ pitā śete |
GV04sankharu:716: etya putra upariṣṭād abhinipadyata indriyair indriyāṇi saṃspṛśya |
GV04sankharu:720: vācaṃ te mayi dadha iti putraḥ |
GV04sankharu:722: prāṇaṃ te mayi dadha iti putraḥ |
GV04sankharu:724: cakṣus te mayi dadha iti putraḥ |
GV04sankharu:726: śrotraṃ te mayi dadha iti putraḥ |
GV04sankharu:728: annarasāṃs te mayi dadha iti putraḥ |
GV04sankharu:730: karmāṇi te mayi dadha iti putraḥ |
GV04sankharu:732: sukhaduḥkhe te mayi dadha iti putraḥ |
GV04sankharu:733: ānandaṃ ratiṃ prajātiṃ me tvayi dadhānīti pitā |
GV04sankharu:734: ānandaṃ ratiṃ prajātiṃ te mayi dadha iti putraḥ |
GV04sankharu:736: ityāṃ te mayi dadha iti putraḥ |
GV04sankharu:737: dhiyo vijñātavyaṃ kāmān me tvayi dadhānīti pitā |
GV04sankharu:738: dhiyo vijñātavyaṃ kāmāṃs te mayi dadha iti putraḥ |
GV04sankharu:740: manas te mayi dadha iti putraḥ |
GV04sankharu:742: prajñāṃ te mayi dadha iti putraḥ |
GV04sankharu:743: yad u vā upābhigadaḥ syāt samāsenaiva brūyāt |
GV04sankharu:745: prāṇāṃs te mayi dadha iti putraḥ
GV04sankharu:748: yaśo brahmavarcasaṃ kīrtis tvā juṣatām iti |
GV04sankharu:750: pāṇināntardhāya vasanāntena vā pracchādya svargāṁl lokān kāmān āpnuhīti |
GV04sankharu:751: sa yadyugadaḥ syāt putrasyaiśvarye pitā vaset |
GV04sankharu:754: yathā samāpayitavyo bhavati yathā samāpayitavyo bhavati ||
GV04sankharu:756: pratardano ha vai daivodāsir indrasya priyaṃ dhāmopajagāma yuddhena ca pauruṣeṇa ca |
GV04sankharu:757: taṃ indra uvāca pratardanaṃ varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti |
GV04sankharu:758: sa hovāca pratardanaḥ - tvam eva me vṛṇīṣva yaṃ tvaṃ manuṣyāya hitatamaṃ manyasa iti
GV04sankharu:759: | taṃ indra uvāca - na vai varo 'varasmai vṛṇīte |
GV04sankharu:761: avaro vai kila meti hovāca pratardanaḥ |
GV04sankharu:764: taṃ hendra uvāca - mām eva vijānīhi |
GV04sankharu:765: etad evāhaṃ manuṣyāya hitatamaṃ manye yo māṃ vijānīyāt |
GV04sankharu:768: bahvīḥ saṃdhā atrikramya divi prahlādīyān atṛṇaham antarikṣe, paulomān pṛthivyāṃ kālakhañjā
GV04sankharu:770: sa yo māṃ veda na ha vai tasya kena ca karmaṇā loko mīyate |
GV04sankharu:771: na steyena na bhrūṇahatyayā na mātṛvadhena na pitṛvadhena |
GV04sankharu:772: nādya pāpaṃ cakruṣo mukhān nīlaṃ vyetīti ||
GV04sankharu:777: yāvad +dhyasmin śarīre prāṇo bhavati yāvad āyuḥ |
GV04sankharu:780: sa yo mām āyur amṛtam ityupāste |
GV04sankharu:783: tad dhaika āhur ekabhūyaṃ vai prāṇā gacchantīti |
GV04sankharu:784: na hi kaścana śaknuyāt sakṛd vācā nāma prajñāpayituṃ cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ śrotreṇa śabdaṃ manasā dhyātum |
GV04sankharu:785: ekabhūyaṃ vai prāṇā bhūtvaivaikaikam etāni sarvāṇi prajñāpayantīti |
GV04sankharu:791: evam u haitad iti hendra uvāca |
GV04sankharu:804: atha khalu prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati |
GV04sankharu:811: yatraitat puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kaṃcana paśyati |
GV04sankharu:813: tad enaṃ vāk sarvair nāmabhiḥ sahāpyeti |
GV04sankharu:818: yathāgner jvalataḥ sarvā diśo visphuliṅgā vipratiṣṭheran evam evaitasmād ātmanaḥ prāṇā yathāyatanaṃ vipratiṣṭhante |
GV04sankharu:821: sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati |
GV04sankharu:828: yatraitat puruṣa ārto mariṣyann ābalyam etya saṃmoham eti |
GV04sankharu:835: tad enaṃ vāk sarvair nāmabhiḥ sahāpyeti |
GV04sankharu:839: sa yadāsmāc charīrād utkrāmati sahaivaitaiḥ sarvair utkrāmati ||
GV04sankharu:851: atha yathāsmai prajñāyai sarvāṇi bhūtānyekaṃ bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:868: tasyānando ratiḥ prajātiḥ parastāt prativihitā bhūtamātrā |
GV04sankharu:872: tasya dhīḥ kāmāḥ parastāt prativihitā bhūtamātrā ||
GV04sankharu:873: prajñayā vācaṃ samāruhya vācā sarvāṇi nāmānyāpnoti |
GV04sankharu:874: prajñayā prāṇaṃ samāruhya prāṇena sarvān gandhān āpnoti |
GV04sankharu:875: prajñayā cakṣuḥ samāruhya cakṣuṣā sarvāṇi rūpāṇyāpnoti |
GV04sankharu:876: prajñayā śrotraṃ samāruhya śrotreṇa sarvāñ chabdān āpnoti |
GV04sankharu:877: prajñayā jihvāṃ samāruhya jihvayā sarvān rasān āpnoti |
GV04sankharu:878: prajñayā hastau samāruhya hastābhyāṃ sarvāṇi karmāṇyāpnoti |
GV04sankharu:879: prajñayā śarīraṃ samāruhya śarīreṇa sukhaduḥkhe āpnoti |
GV04sankharu:881: prajñayā pādau samāruhya pādābhyāṃ sarvā ityā āpnoti |
GV04sankharu:882: prajñayā manaḥ samāruhya manasā sarvāṇi dhyātānyāpnoti |
GV04sankharu:883: na hi prajñāpetā vāṅ nāma kiṃcana prajñāpayet |
GV04sankharu:887: na hi prajñāpetaḥ prāṇo gandhaṃ kaṃcana prajñāpayet |
GV04sankharu:890: na hi prajñāpetaṃ cakṣū rūpaṃ kiṃcana prajñāpayet |
GV04sankharu:893: na hi prajñāpetaṃ śrotraṃ śabdaṃ kaṃcana prajñāpayet |
GV04sankharu:897: na hi prajñāpetā jihvānnarasaṃ kaṃcana prajñāpayet |
GV04sankharu:900: na hi prajñāpetau hastau karma kiṃcana prajñāpayetām |
GV04sankharu:903: na hi prajñāpetaṃ śarīraṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ kiṃcana prajñāpayet |
GV04sankharu:905: nāham etaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ prājñāsiṣam iti |
GV04sankharu:906: na hi prajñāpeta upastha ānandaṃ na ratiṃ na prajātiṃ kāṃcana prajñāpayet |
GV04sankharu:908: nāham etam ānandaṃ na ratiṃ prajātiṃ prājñāsiṣam iti |
GV04sankharu:909: na hi prajñāpetau pādāv ityāṃ kāṃcana prajñāpayet |
GV04sankharu:912: na hi prajñāpetā dhīḥ kāṃcana sidhyet,na prajñātavyaṃ prajñāyet ||
GV04sankharu:927: nānandaṃ na ratiṃ na prajātiṃ vijijñāsīti |
GV04sankharu:933: tā vā etā daśaiva bhūtamātrā adhiprajñam |
GV04sankharu:935: yad dhi bhūtamātrā na syur na prajñāmātrāḥ syuḥ |
GV04sankharu:936: yad vā prajñāmātrā na syur na bhūtamātrāḥ syuḥ |

GV04sankharu:1037: tata u ha bālākiḥ samitpāṇiḥ praticakrama upāyānīti |
GV04sankharu:1039: pratilomarūpam eva tan manye yat kṣatriyo brāhmaṇam upanayeta |
GV04sankharu:1043: taṃ hājātaśatrur āmantrayāñcakre - bṛhan pāṇḍaravāsaḥ soma rājann iti |
GV04sankharu:1047: taṃ hovācājātaśatruḥ - kvaiṣa etad bālāke puruṣo
GV04sankharu:1048: 'śayiṣṭa, yatraitad abhūt, yata etad āgād iti |
GV04sankharu:1049: hitā nama puruṣasya nāḍyo hṛdayāt purītatam abhipratanvanti tad yathā sahasradhā keśo vipāṭitastvāvad aṇvyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1050: piṅgalasyāṇimnyas tiṣṭhanti śuklasya kṛṣṇasya pītasya lohitasya ca |
GV04sankharu:1051: tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kaṃcana paśyati ||
GV04sankharu:1053: tad enaṃ vāk sarvair nāmabhiḥ sahāpyeti
GV04sankharu:1057: sa yadA pratibudhyate, yathāgner jvalataḥ sarvā diśo visphuliṅgā vipratiṣṭheran evam evaitasmād
GV04sankharu:1058: prāṇā yathāyatanaṃ vipratiṣṭhante prāṇebhyo devāḥ devebhyo lokāḥ |
GV04sankharu:1059: sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīram AtmAnam anupraviṣṭa ā lomabhya ā nakhebhyaḥ
GV04sankharu:1060: | tad yathā kṣuraḥ kṣuradhāne vopahito viśvaṃbharo vā viśvaṃbarakulāya evam evaiṣa prajñātmedaṃ śarīram ātmānam anupraviṣṭa ā lomabhya ā
GV04sankharu:1062: tam etam ātmānam eta ātmāno 'nvavasyante yathā śreṣṭhinaṃ svāḥ |
GV04sankharu:1063: tad yatha śreṣṭhī svair bhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ bhuñjanti
GV04sankharu:1065: evam evaita ātmāna etam ātmānaṃ bhuñjanti |

GV04sankharu:1068: ca devānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyam ādhipatyaṃ paryait |

GV04sankharu:1089: pṛthivī pūrvarūpaṃ dyaur uttararūpaṃ vāyuḥ saṃhiteti śauravīro māṇḍūkeyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1090: ākāśaḥ saṃhitetyasya māṇḍavyo vedayāñ cakre - sa hāviparihṛto mene na me 'sya putreṇa samagād iti |
GV04sankharu:1092: samānaṃ hyatra pituśca putrasya ca vāyuś cākāśaś ca |
GV04sankharu:1095: vāk pūrvarūpaṃ mana uttararūpaṃ prāṇaḥ saṃhiteti śauravīro māṇḍūkeyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1096: atha ha smāsya putra āha dīrghaḥ - manasā vā agre kīrtayati tad vācā vadati |
GV04sankharu:1097: tasmān mana eva pūrvarūpaṃ vāg uttararūpaṃ mano vāk prāṇas tveva saṃhiteti |

GV04sankharu:1102: sa yadi nirbhujaḥ khalu vai vayaṃ madhyamo vāk prāṇena mātā jāyā prajñā vāg bṛhadgatirvālisarvamuttamam
GV04sankharu:1104: pṛthivī pūrvarūpaṃ dyaur uttararūpaṃ vāyuḥ saṃhitā vṛṣṭiḥ saṃdhiḥ saṃdhātā |
GV04sankharu:1105: tad utāpi yatraitad balavad anugṛhṇan mahāmegho vṛṣṭiṃ varṣati |
GV04sankharu:1112: yathāsau dyāvāpṛthivyor antareṇākāśa etasminn ākāśe prāṇa āyatto bhavati yathāmuṣminn ākāśe vāyur āyatto bhavati |
GV04sankharu:1113: yathāmūni trīṇi jyotīṃṣyevam imāni puruṣe trīṇi jyotīṃṣi
GV04sankharu:1114: | yathāsau divyāditya evam idaṃ śirasi cakṣuḥ |

GV04sankharu:1136: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1139: sa ya enaṃ prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ bruvan param upavadet śaknuvan kaścic cen manyeta - prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ +samadhām |
GV04sankharu:1142: atha ced aśaknuvan manyeta prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ samadhitsīḥ taṃ nāśakaḥ saṃdhātuṃ prāṇas tvā vaṃśo hāsyatītyevainaṃ brūyāt
GV04sankharu:1143: | yathā nu kathā ca bruvan vābruvan vā brūyād abhyāśam eva yat tat tathā syāt |
GV04sankharu:1144: na tvevānyat kuśalād brāhmaṇaṃ brūyād atidyumna eva brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān nātidyumne ca na brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān namo 'stu brāhmaṇebhya iti śauravīro māṇḍūkeyaḥ ||
GV04sankharu:1145: sa yadi prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ bruvantaṃ param upavadet śaknuvantaṃ cen manyeta -
GV04sankharu:1146: prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ samadhitsiṣam prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ saṃdhitsituṃ na śaknoṣītyāttha |
GV04sankharu:1149: prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ samadhitsīs tan nāśakaḥ saṃdhātum |
GV04sankharu:1151: yathā nu kathā ca bruvantaṃ vābruvantaṃ vā brūyād abhyāśam eva yat tat tathā syāt |
GV04sankharu:1152: na tvevānyat kuśalād brāhmaṇaṃ brūyād atidyumna eva brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān nātidyumne ca na brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān namo 'stu brāhmaṇebhya iti śauravīro māṇḍūkeyaḥ ||
GV04sankharu:1154: pṛthivyāyatanaṃ nirbhujaṃ divāyatanaṃ pratṛṇṇam antartikṣāyatanam ubhayam antareṇa |
GV04sankharu:1155: sa ya enaṃ nirbhujaṃ bruvan param upavadet |
GV04sankharu:1156: pṛthivīṃ devatām āraḥ pṛthivī tvā devatāriṣyatītyenaṃ brūyāt |
GV04sankharu:1157: atha yadi pratṛṇṇam bruvan param upavaded divaṃ devatām āro dyaus tvā devatāriṣyatītyenaṃ brūyāt |
GV04sankharu:1158: atha yadyubhayam antareṇa bruvan param upavaded antarikṣaṃ devatām āra antarikṣaṃ tvā devatāriṣyatītiyenaṃ brūyāt |
GV04sankharu:1159: yad dhi saṃdhiṃ vivartayati tan nirbhujasya rūpam |
GV04sankharu:1160: atha yac chuddhe akṣare abhivyāharati tat pratṛṇṇasyāgra u eva |
GV04sankharu:1162: annādyakāmo nirbhujaṃ brūyāt svargakāṃaḥ pratṛṇṇam ubhayakāma ubhayamantareṇa |

GV04sankharu:1164: atha yadi pratṛṇṇam bruvan param upavaded acyoṣṭhā uttarābhyāṃ sthānābhyām ityevainaṃ brūyāt
GV04sankharu:1166: yathā nu kathā ca bruvan vābruvan vā brūyād abhyāśam kuśalād brāhmaṇaṃ brūyād atidyumna evaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān nātidyumne ca na brāhmaṇaṃ brūyāt |
GV04sankharu:1172: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1173: atha vai vayaṃ brūmo nirbhujavaktrāḥ sma iti ha smāha hvastro māṇḍūkeyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1175: tad yāsau mātrā pūrvarūpottarūpe antareṇa yena saṃdhiṃ vivartayati yena mātrāmātraṃ vibhajati yena svarāt svaraṃ vijñāpayati sā saṃhiteti |
GV04sankharu:1176: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1177: atha ha smāsya putra āha madhyamaḥ prātiyodhīputro magadhavāsī pūrvam evākṣaraṃ pūrvarūpam uttaram uttararūpam |
GV04sankharu:1178: tad yāsau mātrā saṃdhivijñāpanī sāma tad bhavati sāmaihāvaṃ saṃhitāṃ manya iti |
GV04sankharu:1180: mā naḥ stenebhyo ye abhi druhas pade nirāmiṇo ripavo 'nneṣu jāgṛdhuḥ |
GV04sankharu:1181: ā devānām ohate vi vrayo hṛdi bṛhaspate na paraḥ sāmno viduḥ || iti |
GV04sankharu:1182: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1184: prāṇaḥ pavamānena pavamāno viśvair devair viśve devāḥ svargeṇa lokena svargo loko brahmaṇā saiṣāvaraparā saṃhitā |
GV04sankharu:1185: sa ya evam etām avaraparāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda evaṃ haiva sa prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena saṃdhīyate yathaiṣāvaraparā saṃhitā |
GV04sankharu:1186: sa yadi pareṇa vopasṛṣṭaḥ svena vārthenābhivyāhared abhivyāharann eva vidyāt - divaṃ saṃhitāgamad
GV04sankharu:1189: mātā pūrvarūpaṃ pitottararūpaṃ prajā saṃhiteti bhārgavaḥ |

GV04sankharu:1193: aditir hevedaṃ sarvaṃ yad idaṃ kiṃcid viśvabhūtam |
GV04sankharu:1194: tad etad ṛcābhyuditam - aditir dyaur aditir antarikṣaṃ aditir mātā sā pitā sa
GV04sankharu:1196: viśve devā aditiḥ pañca janā aditir jātam aditir janitvam || sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1197: jāyā pūrvarūpaṃ patir uttararūpaṃ putraḥ saṃhitā retaḥ saṃdhiḥ prajananaṃ saṃdhānam iti sthaviraḥ śākalyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1199: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1200: prajñā pūrvarūpaṃ śraddhottararūpaṃ karma saṃhitā satyaṃ saṃdhānam iti kāśyapaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1202: tad āhur yat satyasaṃdhā devā iti |
GV04sankharu:1203: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1205: vācā vai vedāḥ saṃdhīyante vācā chandāṃsi vācā mitrāṇi saṃdadhati |
GV04sankharu:1206: tad yatraitad adhīte vā bhāṣate vā vāci tadā prāṇo bhavati |
GV04sankharu:1208: atha yat svapiti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā bhavati prāṇe tadā vāg bhavati prāṇastadā vācaṃ reḷhi. tāv anyonyaṃ
GV04sankharu:1209: | tad etad ṛcābhyuditam - ekaḥ suparṇaḥ sa samudram āviveśa, sa idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ vicaṣṭe
GV04sankharu:1210: taṃ pākena manasāpaśyam antitas, taṃ mātā reḷhi
GV04sankharu:1213: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1214: bṛhadrathaṃtareṇa rūpeṇa saṃhitā saṃdhīyata iti tārkṣyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1215: vāg vai rathaṃtarasya rūpaṃ prāṇo bṛhataḥ |
GV04sankharu:1216: ubhābhyām u khalu saṃhitā saṃdhīyate vācā ca prāṇena ca |
GV04sankharu:1217: etasyāṃ ha smopaniṣadi saṃvatsaraṃ gā rakṣayata iti tārkṣyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1218: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1219: gatiḥ pūrvvarūpaṃ nivṛttir uttararūpaṃ sthitiḥ saṃhiteti jāratkārava ārtabhāgaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1220: tasyām etasyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ dhvaṃsayo nimeṣāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ kalāḥ kṣaṇā muhūrtā ahorātrā ardhamāsā māsā ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsarāś ca saṃdhīyante |
GV04sankharu:1225: athādhyātmam - bhūtaṃ pūrvarūpaṃ bhaviṣyad uttararūpaṃ bhavat saṃhiteti
GV04sankharu:1227: tad etad ṛcābhyuditam - mahat tan nāma guhyaṃ puruspṛg yena
GV04sankharu:1229: pratnaṃ jātaṃ jyotir yad asya priyaṃ priyāḥ samaviśanta pañca || iti |
GV04sankharu:1230: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1232: pañcemāni mahābhūtāni bhavantīti ha smāha vāliśikhayaniḥ |
GV04sankharu:1233: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyautīṃṣi tāni mithaḥ saṃhitani bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:1234: aatha yānyanyāni kṣudrāṇi mahābhūtaiḥ saṃdhīyante saiṣā sarvavibhūtasaṃhitā |
GV04sankharu:1235: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1236: sarvā vāg brahmeti ha smāha lauhikyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1237: ye tu kecana śabdā vācam eva tāṃ vidyāt |
GV04sankharu:1238: tad apyetad ṛṣir āha - ahaṃ rudrebhir vasubhiś carāmīti |
GV04sankharu:1240: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti |
GV04sankharu:1241: yatā caitad brahma kāmarūpi kāmacāri bhavatyevaṃ haiva sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu kāmarūpī kāmacārī bhavati |
GV04sankharu:1242: ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda ||
GV04sankharu:1244: prāṇo vaṃśa iti ha smāha sthaviraḥ śākalyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1246: 'nye vaṃśāḥ samāhitāḥ syur evam evaitasmin prāṇe sarva ātmā samāhitaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1247: tasyaitadyātmanaḥ prāṇa ūṣmarūpam asthīni sparśarūpaṃ majjānaḥ svararūpaṃ māṃsaṃ lohitam ityetac caturtham antasthārūpam iti |
GV04sankharu:1248: treyaṃ tveva na etat proktam iti ha smāha hvastro māṇḍūkeyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1249: tasyaitasya trayasya trīṇītaḥ ṣaṣṭiśatāni bhavanti saṃdhīnāṃ trīṇītas tāni saptaviṃśatiśatāni bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:1252: sa eṣa saṃvatsarasaṃmānaś cakṣurmayaś śrotramayaś chandomayo manomayo vāṅmaya ātmā |
GV04sankharu:1253: sa ya evam etaṃ saṃvatsarasaṃmānaṃ cakṣurmayaṃ śrotramayaṃ chandomayaṃ manomayaṃ vāmayam ātmānaṃ veda saṃvatsarasya sāyaujyaṃ salokatāṃ sarūpatāṃ sabhakṣatām aśnute |
GV04sankharu:1254: putrī paśumān bhavati sarvam āyur etyasyāruṇikeyo devayāñcakre ||
GV04sankharu:1265: eṣa u ha vai saṃpratiprāṇo yan majjā etad retaḥ na vā ṛte prāṇād retasaḥ siddhir asti |
GV04sankharu:1266: yad vā ṛte prāṇād retaḥ sicyeta tat pūyen na saṃbhavet |
GV04sankharu:1267: yān saṃdhīn adhidaivatam avocāma parvāṇi tānyadhyātmam |
GV04sankharu:1272: sa eṣo 'haḥsaṃmānaś cakṣurmayaś śrotramayaś chandomayo manomayo vāṅmaya ātmā |
GV04sankharu:1273: sa ya evam etad ahaḥsaṃmānaṃ cakṣurmayaṃ śrotramayaṃ chandomayaṃ manomayaṃ vāmayam ātmānaṃ veda ahnāṃ sāyaujyaṃ salokatāṃ sarūpatāṃ sabhakṣatām aśnute |
GV04sankharu:1274: putrī paśumān bhavati sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1275: catvāraḥ puruṣā iti vāstyaḥ - śarīrapuruṣaś chandaḥpuruṣo vedepuruṣo
GV04sankharu:1277: śarīrapuruṣa iti yam avocam ya evāyaṃ daivika ātmā tasyaitasya yo 'yam aśarīraḥ prajñātmā sa rasaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1280: vedapuruṣa iti yam avocāma yena devān vedargvedaṃ yajurvedaṃ sāmavedam iti tasyaitasya brahmarasaḥ
GV04sankharu:1281: tasmād brahmiṣṭhaṃ brahmāṇam ṛtvijaṃ kurvīta yo yajñasyolvaṇaṃ vidyāt |
GV04sankharu:1282: mahāpuruṣa iti yam avocāma saṃvatsara eva tasyaitasyāsāv ādityo rasaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1283: sa yaś cāyam aśarīraḥ prajñātmā yaś cāsāv āditya ekam etad iti vidyāt |
GV04sankharu:1285: citraṃ devānām udagād anīkaṃ cakṣur mitrasya varuṇasyāgneḥ |
GV04sankharu:1286: āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatas tasthuṣaś ca || iti |
GV04sankharu:1287: etām evānuvidyāṃ saṃhitāṃ saṃdhīyamānāṃ manya iti ha smāha vātsyaḥ -- etam u haiva bahvṛcā mahadukthe mīmāṃsanta etam agnāv adhvaryava etaṃ mahāvrate
GV04sankharu:1288: chandogā etam asyām etam antarikṣa etaṃ divi etam agnāv etaṃ vāyāv etaṃ candramasy etaṃ nakṣatreṣv etam apsv etam oṣadhīṣv etaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣv etam akṣareṣv etam eva brahmetyupāsate |
GV04sankharu:1290: ud vayaṃ tamasas pari jyotiṣ paśyanta uttaram |
GV04sankharu:1291: devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam || iti |
GV04sankharu:1292: sa eṣo 'kṣarasaṃmānaś cakṣurmayaḥ śrotramayaś chandamayo manomayo vāṅmaya ātmā |
GV04sankharu:1293: sa ya evam etam akṣarasaṃānaṃ cakṣurmayaṃ śrotramayaṃ chandamayaṃ manomayaṃ vāṅmayam ātmānaṃ parasmai śaṃsati dugdhadohā asya vedā bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:1296: yas tityāja sacividaṃ sakhāyaṃ na tasya vācy api bhāgo asti |
GV04sankharu:1297: yad īṃ śṛnoty alakaṃ śṛṇoti na hi praveda sukṛtasya panthām || iti |
GV04sankharu:1298: nāsyānūkte vāco bhāgo astīty eva tad āha tan na parasmā etad ahaḥ śaṃset |
GV04sankharu:1299: nāgniṃ cinuyān na mahāvratena stuyān ned ātmano 'pihīyā iti |
GV04sankharu:1300: sa yaś cāyam aśarīraḥ prajñātmā yaś cāsāv āditya ekam etad ity avocāma tau yatra vipradṛśyete
GV04sankharu:1301: candramā ivādityo dṛśyate na raśmayaḥ prādur bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:1304: saṃpareto 'syātmā na ciram iva jīviṣyatīti vidyāt |
GV04sankharu:1305: sa yat karaṇīyaṃ manyeta tat kuryāt |
GV04sankharu:1306: athāpyādarśe vodake vā jihmaśirasaṃ vāśirasaṃ vātmānaṃ paśyen na vā paśyet
GV04sankharu:1308: athāpi cchidrā chāyā bhavati na vā bhavati tad apy evam eva vidyāt |
GV04sankharu:1309: athāpi cchidra ivādityo rathanābhir ivākhyāyet tad apy evam eva vidyāt |
GV04sankharu:1310: athāpi nīla ivāgnir dṛśyeta yathā mayūragrīvā mahāmeghe vā marīcīr iva paśyet |
GV04sankharu:1312: abhra enāṃ mna paśyet tad apy evam eva vidyāt |
GV04sankharu:1313: athāpy apidhāyākṣiṇī upekṣeta tatraitad varāṭakānīva na paśyet tad apy evam eva vidyāt |
GV04sankharu:1315: ya eṣo 'gner iva jvalataḥ śabdo rathasyevopabdis taṃ na
GV04sankharu:1316: yadā śṛṇuyāt tad apy evam eva vidyāt |
GV04sankharu:1317: athāpi viparyaste kanyake dṛśyete dvijihmevā na vā dṛśyetetad apy evam eva vidyāt |
GV04sankharu:1319: 'vijñāto 'dṛṣṭo 'nādiṣṭo 'ghuṣṭaḥ śrotā mantā vijñātā draṣṭādeṣṭā ghoṣṭā sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām āntaraḥ puruṣaḥ sa ma ātmeti vidyāt |
GV04sankharu:1320: sa utkrāmann evaitam aśarīraṃ prajñātmānam abhisaṃpadyate vijahātītaraṃ dauhikam |
GV04sankharu:1324: pṛthivyā rūpaṃ sparśā antarikṣasyoṣmāṇo divaḥ svarāḥ |
GV04sankharu:1325: agne rūpaṃ sparśā vāyor ūṣmāṇa ādityasya svarāḥ |
GV04sankharu:1326: ṛgvedasya rūpaṃ sparśā yajurvedasyoṣmāṇaḥ sāmavedasya svarāḥ |
GV04sankharu:1327: rathantarasya rūpaṃ sparśā vāmadevyasyoṣmāṇo bṛhataḥ svarāḥ |
GV04sankharu:1328: prāṇasya rūpaṃ sparśā apānasyoṣmāṇo manasaḥ svarāḥ |
GV04sankharu:1329: prāṇasya rūpaṃ sparśā apānasyoṣmāṇa udānasya svarāḥ svarā iti punardattaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1330: eṣa u haiva sarvāṃ vācaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda ||
GV04sankharu:1331: atha khalv iyaṃ daivī vīṇā bhavati tadanukṛtir asau mānuṣī bhavati |
GV04sankharu:1332: tad yatheyaṃ śastravatī tardmavatī bhavaty evam evāsau śastravatī tardmavatī bhavati |
GV04sankharu:1333: tad yathāsyāḥ śira evam amuṣyāḥ śiraḥ |
GV04sankharu:1334: tad yathāsyai vaṃśa evam amuṣyā daṇḍaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1335: tad yathāsyā udaram evam amuṣyā ambhaṇaṃ |
GV04sankharu:1336: tad yathāsyai mukhanāsike akṣiṇī ity evam amuṣyāś chidrāṇi |
GV04sankharu:1337: tad yathāsyā aṅgulinigrahā upastaraṇānīty evam amuṣyāḥ parvāṇi |
GV04sankharu:1338: tad yathāsyā aṅgulaya evam amuṣyās tantryaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1340: tad yathāsyāḥ svarā evam amuṣyāḥ svarāḥ |
GV04sankharu:1341: tad yathā haiveyaṃ romaśena carmaṇāpihitā bhavaty evam evāsau romaśena carmaṇāpihitā bhavati
GV04sankharu:1342: romaśena ha sma carmaṇā purā vīṇā apidadhati |
GV04sankharu:1344: sa ya evam etāṃ daivīṃ vīṇāṃ veda śrutavadanatamo bhavati bhūmiprāsya kīrtir bhavati +śuśrūṣante hāsya parṣatsu bhāṣyamāṇasyedam astu yad ayam īhate yatrāryā vāg vadati vidur enaṃ tatra athātas tāṇḍavindasya vacaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1345: tad yatheyaṃ akuśalena vādayitrāvīṇārabdhā na kṛtsnaṃ vīṇārthaṃ sādhayaty evam evākuśalena vaktrā vāg ārabdhā na kṛtsnaṃ vāg arthaṃ sādhayati |
GV04sankharu:1346: tad yathā haiveyaṃ kuśalena vādayitrā vīṇārabdhā kṛtsnaṃ vīṇārthaṃ sādhayaty evam eva kuśalena vaktrā vāg ārabdhā kṛtsnaṃ vāg arthaṃ sādhayati |
GV04sankharu:1347: tasyai vā etasyai vīṇāyai yā tviṣiḥ sā saṃhiteti kātyāyanīputro jātūkarṇyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1348: atha ha smaitat kṛtsnahārito brāhmaṇam evodāharati ||
GV04sankharu:1349: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā vyasraṃsata sa chandobhir ātmānaṃ samadadhat |
GV04sankharu:1350: tad yac chandobhir ātmānaṃ samadadhat tasmāt saṃhitā |
GV04sankharu:1351: tasyai vā etasyai saṃhitāyai ṇakaro balaṃ ṣakāraḥ prāṇa ātmā saṃhitā |
GV04sankharu:1352: athaiṣā kṣudramiśrā vikṛtis tāni nakhāni romāṇi vyañjanānīti |
GV04sankharu:1353: sa yo 'tra vicikitset saṇakāraṃ eva brūyād ṛte ṇakāram iti saṇakāram eva brūyāt |
GV04sankharu:1355: vicikitset saṣakāraṃ eva brūyād ṛte ṣakāram iti saṣakāram eva brūyāt |
GV04sankharu:1356: tau vā etau ṇakāraṣakārau vidvān anusaṃhitam ṛco 'dhīyītāyuṣyam iti vidyād evam eva vidyāt
GV04sankharu:1357: atha vāg itihāsapurāṇaṃ yac cānyat kiṃcid brāhmīkṛtyevādhīyīta tad apy evam eva vidyāt |
GV04sankharu:1358: te yad vayam anusaṃhitam ṛco 'dhīmahe yac ca māṇḍūkeyīyam adhyāyaṃ prabrūmas tena no ṇakāraṣakārā upāptāv iti ha smāha hrasvo māṇḍūkeyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1359: atha yad vayam anusaṃhitam ṛco 'dhīmahe yac ca svādhyāyam adhīmahe tena no ṇakāraṣakārā upāptāv iti ha smāha sthaviraḥ śākalyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1360: etad dha sma vai tad vidvāṃsa āhuḥ kāvaṣeyāḥ kimarthā vayaṃ yakṣyāmahe kimarthā vayam adheṣyāmahe vāci hi prāṇaṃ juhumaḥ prāṇe vācaṃ yo hy eva prabhavaḥ sa evāpyaya iti |
GV04sankharu:1361: tā etāḥ saṃhitā nānantevāsine brūyān nāsaṃvatsaravāsine nābrahmacāriṇe nāvedavide nāpavaktra ity ācāryā ity ācāryāḥ ||
GV04sankharu:1370: dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt || adabdhaṃ mana iṣiraṃ cakṣuḥ |
GV04sankharu:1371: sūryo jyotiṣāṃ śreṣṭho dīkṣe mā mā hiṃsīḥ ||
GV04sankharu:1372: yo ha vai jyeṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda jyeṣṭhaś ca ha vai śreṣṭhaś ca svānāṃ bhavati |
GV04sankharu:1373: prāṇo vai jyeṣṭhaś ca śreṣṭhaś ca |
GV04sankharu:1374: yo ha vai vasiṣṭhāṃ veda vasiṣṭho ha svānāṃ bhavati vāg vai vasiṣṭhā |
GV04sankharu:1375: yo ha vai pratiṣṭhāṃ veda prati ha tiṣṭhaty asmiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca cakṣur ha pratiṣṭhā
GV04sankharu:1376: yo ha vai saṃpadaṃ veda saṃ hāsmai kāmāḥ saṃpadyante śrotraṃ ha vā u saṃpat |
GV04sankharu:1377: yo ha vā āyatanaṃ vedāyatano ha svānāṃ bhavati mano vā āyatanam |
GV04sankharu:1378: atha hemā devatāḥ prajāpatiṃ pitaram etyābruvan ko vai naḥ śreṣṭha iti |
GV04sankharu:1379: sa hovāca prajāpatir yasmin va utkrānte śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭham iva manyate sa vai śreṣṭha iti ||
GV04sankharu:1381: yathā mūkā avadantaḥ prāṇantaḥ prāṇena paśyantaś cakṣuṣā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa dhyāyanto manasaivam iti ||
GV04sankharu:1383: yathāndhā apaśyantaḥ prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa dhyāyanto manasaivam iti ||
GV04sankharu:1385: yathā badhirā aśṛṇvantaḥ prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā paśyantaḥ cakṣuṣā dhyāyanto manasaivam iti ||
GV04sankharu:1387: yathā bālā amanasaḥ prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā paśyantaḥ cakṣuṣā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇaivam iti ||
GV04sankharu:1389: tatas tad yatheha saindhavaḥ suhayaḥ paḍbīśaśaṅkūn saṃkhided evam asau prāṇān samakhidat |
GV04sankharu:1390: te ha sametyocur bhagavan motkramīr iti |
GV04sankharu:1391: sa hovāca prāṇaḥ kiṃ me 'nnaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
GV04sankharu:1393: kiṃ me vāso bhaviṣyatīty āpa iti hocuḥ |
GV04sankharu:1394: tasmād vā ayam aśiṣyan purastāc copariṣṭāc cādbhiḥ paridadhāti |
GV04sankharu:1395: lambhuko hāsya vāso bhavaty anagno hi bhavati |
GV04sankharu:1396: had dha smaitat satyakāmo jābālo gośrute vaiyāghrapadyāyoktvovāca |
GV04sankharu:1397: apy evaṃ śuṣkasya sthāṇoḥ prabrūyāj jayerann asya śākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśanīti |
GV04sankharu:1398: vanaspate śatavalśo viroheti dyāṃ mā lekhīr antarikṣaṃ mā mā hiṃsīr iti ha yājñavalkyaḥ ||

GV04sankharu:1453: tad etad vairājaṃ daśavidhaṃ agnihotraṃ hutaṃ bhavati |
GV04sankharu:1454: rohobhyāṃ rohobhyām abhyārūḷham abhi svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayati ya evaṃ vidvān aśnāti ca pibati cāśayati ca pāyayati ca |
GV04sankharu:1455: atha ya idam avidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti yathāṅgārān apohya bhasmani hutaṃ tādṛk tatyās tādṛk tat syāt ||
GV04sankharu:1458: tasminn etā devatā āveśayad vācy agniṃ prāṇe vāyuṃ apāne vidyuta udāne parjanyaṃ cakṣuṣy ādityaṃ manasi candramasaṃ śrotre diśaḥ śarīre pṛthivīṃ retasy apo bala indraṃ manyāv īśānaṃ mūrdhany ākāśaṃ ātmani brahma |
GV04sankharu:1459: sa yathā mahān amṛtakumbhaḥ pinvamānas tiṣṭhed evaṃ haiva sa tasthau |
GV04sankharu:1460: atha hemā devatā īkṣāṃ cakrire kim ayam asmābhiḥ puruṣaḥ kariṣyati kiṃ vā vayam anena |
GV04sankharu:1463: atha hedaṃ śarīraṃ riktam iva parisuṣiraṃ sa hekṣāñcakre prajāpatī randhrāya na kṣamam |
GV04sankharu:1466: tā hopāṣrṣṭāḥ sukhaṃ alabhamānā imam eva puruṣaṃ punaḥ pratyāviviśuḥ ||
GV04sankharu:1480: sa yathā mahān vṛkṣa ārdra upasiktamūlas tiṣṭhed evaṃ haiva sa tasthau ||
GV04sankharu:1481: athāyaṃ puruṣaḥ preṣyan purā saṃvatsarāt saṃvatsarasya dṛṣṭīḥ paśyati |
GV04sankharu:1482: chidrā chāyā bhavati na vā bhavati |
GV04sankharu:1483: mahāmeghe vā marīcīr iva paśyed anabhre vā vidyutaṃ paśyed abhra enāṃ na paśyet |
GV04sankharu:1484: akṣiṇī vā apidhāya varāṭakānīvā na paśyati |
GV04sankharu:1486: nāsmiṁl loke ramate nainaṃ manaś chandayati |
GV04sankharu:1489: puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇadantaṃ paśyati sa enaṃ hanti varāha enaṃ hanti markaṭa enaṃ hanti enaṃ hanti bisāni khādayati suvarṇaṃ bhakṣayitvāvagiraty ekapauṇḍarīkaṃ dhārayati gāṃ savatsāṃ dakṣiṇāmukho naladamālī vrājayati |
GV04sankharu:1490: sa yady eteṣāṃ kiṃcit paśyet pāṇḍuradarśanāṃ kālīṃ strīṃ muktakeśāṃ muṇḍāṃ tailābhyaṅgaṃ kausumbhaparidhānaṃ gītāny uṣṭrārohanaṃ dakṣiṇāśāgamanādīni vīkṣyopoṣya pāyasaṃ sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvā sarūpavatsāyā goḥ payasi na tv eva tu kṛṣṇāyā agnim upasamādhāya parisamuhya paristīrya paryukṣya dakṣiṇaṃ jānv ācya sruveṇājyahutīr juhoti ||
GV04sankharu:1504: athaitad ājyāvaśeṣaṃ sthālīpāke samavaninīya sthālīpākasyopaghātaṃ juhoti
GV04sankharu:1505: vāci me 'gniḥ pratiṣṭhito vāg hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā |
GV04sankharu:1506: prāṇe me vāyuḥ pratiṣṭhito prāṇo hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā |
GV04sankharu:1507: apāne me vidyutaḥ pratiṣṭhitā apāno hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā |
GV04sankharu:1508: udāne me parjanyaḥ pratiṣṭhita udānaṃ hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā |
GV04sankharu:1509: cakṣuṣi ma ādityaḥ pratiṣṭhitaś cakṣur hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā |
GV04sankharu:1510: manasi me candramāḥ pratiṣṭhito mano hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā |
GV04sankharu:1511: śrotre me diśaḥ pratiṣṭhitā diśo hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā |
GV04sankharu:1512: śarīre me pṛthhivī pratiṣṭhitā pṛthivī hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā |
GV04sankharu:1513: bale ma indraḥ pratiṣṭhitā balaṃ hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā |
GV04sankharu:1514: manyau ma īśānaḥ pratiṣṭhito manyur hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā |
GV04sankharu:1515: mūrdhani ma ākāśaḥ pratiṣṭhito mūrdhā hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā |
GV04sankharu:1516: ātmani me brahma pratiṣṭhitam ātmā hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā |
GV04sankharu:1518: aśmā jāgatam ayas traiṣṭubhaṃ loham auṣṇihaṃ sīsaṃ kākubhaṃ rajataṃ svārājyaṃ suvarṇaṃ gāyatram annaṃ vairājaṃ tṛptir ānuṣṭubhaṃ nākaṃ sāmrājyaṃ bṛhaspatir bārhataṃ brahma pāṅktaṃ prajāpatir ātichandasaṃ sāvitrī sarvavedachandasena chandaseti ||

GV04sankharu:1556: agnir iva kakṣaṃ vibhṛtaḥ purutrā vāteṣu nas tigmajambho 'nu mārṣṭi ||9|| ayaṃ sano yo 'nuvādī kīla iva vṛtraṃ vi puro ruroja |
GV04sankharu:1557: anenendro vi mṛdho vihatyā śatrūyatām ābharā bhojanāni ||10||
GV04sankharu:1558: jayendra śatrūñ jahi śūra dasyūn vṛtraṃ hatveva kuliśenā vi vṛśca |
GV04sankharu:1559: augha iva śāpān pra ṇudāt sapatnāñ jahyāt sapatnān svadhitir vaneva ||11|| anu vṛśca madhyāt prati vṛścopariṣṭād vi vṛśca paścāt prati śūra vṛśca |
GV04sankharu:1560: tvayā praṇuttān maghavann amitrān śūra riṣantaṃ maruto 'nu yantu ||12|| tvāṃ rudrair hetibhiḥ pinvamānā indraṃ manvānā maruto juṣanta |
GV04sankharu:1561: suparṇāḥ kaṅkāḥ pra mṛśanto enān mahīyatāṃ daṃṣṭrī vardhaneṣu ||13|| brahmaṇuttasya maghavan pṛtanyato viṣvag indra bhaṅgāḥ patantu |
GV04sankharu:1562: mā jñātāram īśata mā pratiṣṭhāṃ mitho vighnānā upa yānti mṛtyum ||14|| agne yaśasvin yaśase sam arpayendravatīm apacitim ihā vaha |
GV04sankharu:1563: ayaṃ mūrdhā parameṣṭhī suvarcāḥ sajātānām uttamaśloko astu ||15||
GV04sankharu:1564: bhadraṃ paśyanta upa sedur āgan tato dīkṣām ṛṣayaḥ svarvidaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1565: tataḥ kṣatraṃ balam ojaś ca jātaṃ tad asmai devā abhi saṃ namantām ||16|| dhātā vidhātā paramota saṃdṛk prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī suvarccāḥ |
GV04sankharu:1566: stomāṃś chandāṃsi nivido ma āhur etasmai rāṣṭram abhi saṃ namantām ||17|| abhy ā vartadhvam upa sevatāgnim ayaṃ śāstādhipatir no astu |
GV04sankharu:1567: asya vijñānam anu saṃ rabhadhvam imaṃ paścād anu jīvātha sarve ||18|| alardo nāma jāto 'si
GV04sankharu:1569: taṃ tvā sapatnakṣayaṇaṃ vedātha viṣṭambhajambhanam ||19|| nārdhe pramīyeta tared dviṣantaṃ kalpeta vākyaṃ pṛtanāḥ saheta |
GV04sankharu:1570: pramāyukaṃ tasya dviṣantam āhur irāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti ||20||
GV04sankharu:1571: na sa śaptam aśnāti kilbiṣaṃ kṛtaṃ nainaṃ divyo varuṇo hanti bhītam |
GV04sankharu:1572: nainaṃ kruddhaṃ manyavo 'bhi yantīrāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti ||21||
GV04sankharu:1573: nāsya tvacaṃ hiṃsati jātvedā na māṃsam aśnāti na hanti tāni |
GV04sankharu:1574: śatāyur asmiñ jaradaṣṭiḥ praitīrāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti ||22|| nāsya prajā duṣyati jāyamānā na śailago bhavati na pāpakṛtyā |
GV04sankharu:1575: nānyan mithas tasya kuleṣu jāyata irāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti ||23|| nāsyāpavādā na pravādakā gṛhe na saṃpatatryo na viveśa tasmai |
GV04sankharu:1576: nāsminn alakṣmīḥ kurute niveśanam irāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti ||24|| nainaṃ rakṣo na piśāco hinasti na jambhako nāpy asuro na yakṣaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1577: na sūtikā tasya kuleṣu jāyate irāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti ||25||
GV04sankharu:1578: nainaṃ vyāghro na vṛko na dvīpī na śvāpadaṃ hiṃsati kiṃcanainam |
GV04sankharu:1579: na hastinaṃ kruddham upaiti bhītim irāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti ||26||
GV04sankharu:1580: nainaṃ sarpo na pṛdākur hinasti na vṛściko na tiraścīnarājiḥ |
GV04sankharu:1581: nainaṃ kṛṣṇo 'hir abhi saṃhata irāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti ||27|| nainaṃ pramattaṃ varuṇo hinasti na makaro na grahaḥ śiṃśumāraḥ |
GV04sankharu:1582: pārāvarāc chivam asmai kṛṇotīrāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti ||28|| pramāyukam asya dviṣantam
GV04sankharu:1585: ogha iva śāpān pra ṇudāt sapatnān |
GV04sankharu:1586: irāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti ||29|| ayaṃ maṇiḥ pratisaro jāmbo jīvāya badhyate |
GV04sankharu:1587: anenendro vṛtram ahann ṛṣiṇā ca manīṣiṇā ||30||
GV04sankharu:1589: nāga iva pūrvapādābhyām abhi tiṣṭha pṛtanyataḥ ||31|| āgād ayaṃ bailvo maṇiḥ sapatnakṣapaṇo vṛṣā |
GV04sankharu:1590: taṃ paśyanti kavayaḥ sarvavīrā yathā sapatnān samare saheyuḥ ||32|| anṛtaṃ me maṇau sūtram aśvināv api nahyatām |
GV04sankharu:1591: bailvaḥ sahasravīryo 'si mā te bhartā riṣam aham ||33|| ghṛtād ullupto madhumān
GV04sankharu:1593: rujan sapatnān adharāṃś ca kṛṇvan ā roha māṃ mahate saubhagāya ||34|| prajāpate na tvad etāny anyo viśvā jatāni pari tā babhūva |
GV04sankharu:1594: yatkāmas te juhumas tan no astu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām ||35|| śāsa itthā mahāṁ asīti pañca
GV04sankharu:1596: bhūtikāmaḥ puṣpeṇa trirātropoṣito jīvato hastino dantān mātrām uddhṛtyāgnim upasamādhāya parisamuhya paristīrya paryukṣya dakṣiṇaṃ jānv ācyottarato 'gneḥ kaṃse maṇiṃ kṛtvā hutvā homān maṇau
GV04sankharu:1598: hastivarcasam ity etābhiḥ pratyṛcam aṣṭābhiḥ saptarātraṃ madhusarpiṣor vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyād ghṛtād ullupta ity etayarcā |
GV04sankharu:1599: ata evottaraṃ ṣaḍbhir hṛdayaśūlāgramaṇiṃ pratodāgramaṇiṃ vā muśalāgramaṇiṃ vā khadirasāramaṇiṃ vā māṃsaudane vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyāt |
GV04sankharu:1600: ata evottaraṃ catasṛbhir vṛṣabhaśṛṅgāgramaṇiṃ ghṛtaudane vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyāt
GV04sankharu:1601: ata evottaraṃ ekayairaṇḍamaṇiṃ tilaudane vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyāt |
GV04sankharu:1602: ata evottaraṃ ṣoḷaśabhir bailvaṃ saptarātraṃ madhusarpiṣor vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyād ghṛtād ullupta ity etayarcā |
GV04sankharu:1603: ata evottaraṃ pañcabhir mahāvarāsyodohaṃ mudgaudane vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyāc chaktau sati prathamaṃ hastichāyāyāṃ vaiyāghre vāpi carmaṇy āsīno vāpi juhuyād āsīno vāpi juhuyāt ||
GV04sankharu:1607: tad u ha vātmā draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavya iti |
GV04sankharu:1608: tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena vividiṣanti brahmacaryeṇa tapasā śraddhayā yajñenānāśakena ceti māṇḍūkeyaḥ
GV04sankharu:1609: tasmād evaṃvic chānto dānta uparatas titikṣuḥ śraddhāvitto bhūtvātmany evātmānaṃ paśyed iti māṇḍavyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1611: vijñānamayaḥ puruṣaḥ prāṇeṣu sa eṣa neti nety ātmā na gṛhya idaṃ brahmedaṃ kṣatram ime devā ime vedā ime lokā imāni sarvāṇi bhūtānīdaṃ sarvaṃ yad ayam ātmā |
GV04sankharu:1612: sa eṣa tat tvam asīty ātmāvagamyo 'haṃ brahmāsmīti |
GV04sankharu:1613: tad etad brahmāpūrvam aparam anaparam anantaram abāhyam ayam ātmā brahma sarvānubhūr ity anuśāsanam iti yājñavalkyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1614: tad etan nāputrāya nānantevāsine vā brūyād iti |
GV04sankharu:1615: ya imām adbhiḥ parigṛhītāṃ vasumatīṃ dhanasya pūrṇāṃ dadyād idam eva tato bhūya idam eva tato bhūya ity anuśāsanam |
GV04sankharu:1616: tām etām upaniṣadaṃ vedaśiro na yathā kathaṃ cana vadet |
